agent_utterance: You're doing great. Given the heat and a busy Monday, try a simple, low-effort routine before meals: 1) drink a glass of water, 2) pause for 2 minutes to check in, 3) take 4 slow breaths, 4) rate your hunger from 0 (not hungry) to 10 (very hungry), 5) set a 30‑minute reminder to reassess, and 6) if needed and approved by your clinician, have a small snack. Keep this to about a 4/10 effort today—predictable and doable. I’m here to adjust if today feels tougher.
